game_description: BeFootball SuperPlayer is part of BeFootballâ€™s immersive metaverse. For the first time, a complete ecosystem designed by professional players and dedicated to soccer arrives to VR. The most realistic physics at the service of the most practiced sport in the world. In BF SuperPlayer you will be able to have fun with: - Annual championships (BeFootball WorldCups) with prizes and very important sponsors. - Elite players, teams and official stadiums from different countries. - The most important stadiums recreated with the highest fidelity, and the chance to visit them. - Game modes with a special dynamic difficulty system that adapts to your progress. - Worldwide leaderboards and rankings.. - DLCs with the best quality content to expand competitions, teams, stadiums, museums... - An included Demo area of our BeFootball Move world: move through musicalized exercise trainings endorsed by professional trainers. BeFootball SuperPlayer, the first immersive soccer metaverse at your fingertips.
review_2: Its a good game but they shoot to many balls
review_3: 10 balls at once i cant even focus uninstalled immediately
review_4: This is fun to play and it's a great workout as well. Can't wait till they release the full thing. And I just ranked #5 in the world rankings for the keeper mode. BOOM! (*Drops mic) Update: still love this game. played almost every day so far. Now ranked #2 worldwide keeper mode reppin USA all the way!
review_5: Had so much fun.it is very challenging but that makes it fun
